verbose_text: For example, when syncytial Drosophila embryos are treated with a variety of DNA damaging agents, including ionizing radiation (IR), which induces double stranded breaks (DSB), and Aphidicolin and hydroxyurea (HU), both of which block DNA replication, centrosome amplification occurs in cells experiencing severe DNA damage.
evidence: IR), which induces double-stranded breaks (DSB), and Aphidicolin
